website_summaries.verdict: In the realm of online combat, Battlefield 3 provides thrills that few games can match.
pros: Deep and varied multiplayer competitionAwesome array of vehiclesMany attractive environmentsRewards teamwork handsomely
cons: Campaign is disappointing and dullOnly six cooperative missionsNo way to practice jet flight outside of multiplayer

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but a goodie! Still worth the multiple playthroughs it affords...
customer_reviews.text: Despite being several releases older now, Battlefield 3 is still a fun experience. I personally don't think it makes sense to play this one online if you have the others, but if you do not, Battlefield 3 offers both entertaining and exciting single player as well as intense multiplayer. I bought it simply for the single player campaign, so I could catch up on the backstory of the series after playing Battlefield 4. As cheap as it is now, it is very worth the price it goes for now, even as a timewaster.
customer_reviews.author: TKALA

customer_reviews.title: If you like battlefield, you'll love this game.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to really review video games on here, either you know what you're getting yourself in to or you don't. Great online play, a campaign that will put call of duty to shame, and on a console that it apparently one of the most popular ones to purchase, especially concerning the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob lee c

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad game that was improved by the fact it cost ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad game that was improved by the fact it cost $15 instead of 60-70. Guess I'm getting old because I still like to play games that aren't connected online and that don't cost me half a months paycheck after upgrades and so forth.
customer_reviews.author: North Land

customer_reviews.title: Battlefield 3 - Playstation 3--One of the Best FPS Experiences I Have Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: This game isn't not as pretty nor as action-packed as it's PC version, but that's just because of the outdated console hardware and not the game. Even though it's only 24 players, most of the maps feel perfectly populated. The destructive environment is still awesome, but not as extensive as previous titles. Gun balance is great, but class balance is poor. There is really not much of a reason to play either the Recon class or the Support class, though they can be crucial in certain instances. The battles are fantastic fun. You'll never find a game (except for maybe Planetside, which isn't even on consoles) that has battles this grand.
customer_reviews.author: Brent B

customer_reviews.title: Downright Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty amazing when it comes to multiplayer. I have spent over 173 hours playing online and I am not done with. The online multiplayer had it flaws here and there but Dice was fast to patch it up. The developers are actively supporting this game to what it seems like until March 2013 The singleplayer missions are decent and unique. I find it acceptable as I have dealt with terrible games in the past that make a singleplayer unplayable. There wasn't any graphical, or audio glitches to be found. I would definitely pick this game up, but I would get the Premium Edition as the DLC content is a very nice addition to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A Classic Battlefield Title!
customer_reviews.text: This is still my favorite Battlefield game to date, with Battlefield 4 being a very close second. It's such a shame though that Battlefield 3 hasn't been updated to run on the current gen consoles with 64 player servers. That experience would undoubtedly be the best military first person shooter experience for the PlayStation 4, and Xbox One, hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Curious Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome GAME!!
customer_reviews.text: I love BF3. I play it more than any other game I own. As a matter of fact its about the only game I play. The realism in this game is unmatched. At times, in multiplayer, the intensity in the game is unmatched. The Frostbite 2 engine is great, and destructable environments add a dynamic that is unmatched by any other shooter out there period. This is not an Arcade type shooter like COD, so be prepared for a learning curve. Once you have passed the test you will find this game to be a much more satisfying experience than any other shooter out there.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: so awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We have had Battlefield for over a year now and think it is so much fun. Me and my 9 ye old son play it and I personally think its the best FPS out there. I wish this had some of the functionality of the Call Of Duty series. for instance: multiple players playing on line or other games. Like on Call of Duty, you can have up to 4 players playing on the same console at the same time. If Battlefield had this type of playability, it would hands down be the best out there. Also, I wish I could mute the foul language for when my 9 yr old plays...
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Ray Powers

customer_reviews.title: Best MP Game ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Michael Jordan, the Beattles, the ferrari, the Roger Federer, the Ayrton Senna, the Bill Clinton, the Rolex, the Forrest Gump of multiplayer video games. Had BFBC2 and loved it, BF3 much better MP experience (single player not so good, but ho plays battlefield for SP). The realism in the game is very good, your can do about anything here, great graphs, lots of weapons, maps are very well made, love the new way of getting weapons upgrades. I have Medal of Honor, and COD, (HALO not included since is to futuristic for me)for me none of this games compare to BF3. The only downside i have is that maps are to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: zcucurullo

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but with some bugs a patch can fix
customer_reviews.text: This game gives you PTSD! A lot of bugs (like having to press the jump button to get over a sidewalk curb), but the developers seem interested in keeping with it, and patches will be forthcoming. Blowing up buildings is fun, and the real standout is the vehicles: tanks, jets, helicopters, oh my! It's great to squad up with mates and use teamwork to take on the opposition. And, teamwork is really the key to success in this game, which is something I love, but others may hate. No lone wolves; they just get shot. If you're looking for some outstanding graphics, teamwork, awesome vehicles, and great customizability, this is a great game to get.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMandke

customer_reviews.title: Got bored quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of my unending love for battlefied bad company 2. I played the heck out of that game. I bought this, played for like 1 month very solid and just got bored. I love the game play and physics, but hate the focus on vehicles. They have made helicopters too powerful and if you are not an engineer you cannot do much. So all I ended up playing was team death match. That was fun at first, then I realized I might as well be playing black ops. Bought black ops 2. I have to limit my game play because I love it. Buy black ops 2.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: I've Logged in 120+ Hours on Multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat, the Single Player is so-so at best. The pacing is off at times, and something about dying in this game feels way more annoying than other FPSs I've played. However, the multiplayer is amazing. I've logged in over 120 hours in multi and it's just as fun as it was when I was playing the beta on PS3. The only thing I hate about this is the fact that I payed $60 for this when it was first released, and now I can go buy the premium edition with all DLC for $40. C'MON EA!! Treat the early adopters to your game. What the hell?
customer_reviews.author: theOriginalPosition

customer_reviews.title: By Far The Best Multiplayer Game Out There!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best multiplayer game hands down. A first-person shooter with destructible environments, large-scale maps, controllable vehicles, and online support for up to 24 simultaneous players. Still dont like the fact how u have to switch back and forth form US to Russian weapons, and wish it had more maps,(Can't wait for the Back to Karkand DL) a few kinks here and there not 100% kink free but what game is, all-in-all still a great multiplayer game! Campaign could be a bit more polished, I give it 4 1/2 stars and not yet played co-op mode. Battlefield series countinues to be addicting and should be the front runner in 1st person shooters for yrears to come! GET THIS GAME!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew more about this game when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew more about this game when I owned it, but it froze up on me during the second mission of the campaign and never worked for me again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fun...
customer_reviews.text: This game was fun....but after beating the campaign I never picked it back up. I know a lot of people enjoy the online game play and getting all the trophies they can, but I just played for fun. Great graphics and in typical battlefield tradition you can destroy a lot of the environment. Maybe if I went for more the online play I would rate it higher. But I really could have done without this purchase. The story was good and you get to even fly in it. Fun, but as I said I haven't picked this game up in awhile and have no plans to.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky Gamer

customer_reviews.title: The best game of ALL TIME!
customer_reviews.text: I love BF3 because you get soo much bang for your buck! DICE, the developers, refuse to let you get bored of the game. They just keep it coming with all of their expansion packs which keeps the multiplayer game fresh and refreshing to play over and over again. There is just so much to love, from the huge maps, to the vehicles, to the level of realism of the game! Make sure you buy the Premium edition as it is $50 alone, but worth every penny either way!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: No bugs anymore
customer_reviews.text: Bugs in a game are very annoying. The rubberbanding on EA's PS3 servers completely made Multiplayer frustrating. After the patch fixed it, best FPS I've played yet. Not the singleplayer though. If I want to play a singleplayer game I'll go for an RPG... After COD4 they've all been the same. Tiny maps, no vehicles unless you kill 230958023520395023950257 people without dieing, and even then you only get to "drive" it for a several seconds and countless idiots that hardly ever move around. BF3 trumps anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Damit

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game. The graphics and game-play are unreal and the multiplayer modes are very addictive. This my first purchase in the battlefield genre and I couldn't be happier. The coolest thing about this game is the battlenet feature which is like a social network for you and other battlefield 3 players. You can track you and your friends stats, accuracy, kills, medals and weapon unlocks all from the portal. I have enjoyed keeping up with my friends who play on other platforms than PS3. Great game and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: wesley1008

customer_reviews.title: Great service hard game to learn, has nothing to do with seller though, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just not a quick learner with this game, I play so many games left and right for some reason this game is really difficult to get around, I couldn't get on multiplayer it wasn't easy for me, I still haven't learned how to get on multiplayer, but enough about me being an idiot with this game, this review is to let you know that I got the game super fast, and it was in great condition, great seller I would def, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nayveed

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great present for my nephew. He loved it. Was in good condition and arrived packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Chippy

customer_reviews.title: I'm use to COD I guess
customer_reviews.text: Maybe because i am use to COD I didnt like this game, but it seemed overly complicated. Maybe if I spent more time with it it would be more fun, but I just wanted to run around and shoot people. The multiplayer seemed less elegant than COD. The story mode was much more realistic but that is not much fun when you have it on the easy level and you die every 2 mins. Again, it's not what I am use to but im sure others will love it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J

customer_reviews.title: Great video game
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good battlefield game not the best but def not the worst. I enjoyed playing this one
customer_reviews.author: Jake Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good fun game
customer_reviews.text: Maps are real big compared to MW3 or Black Op maps..You can drive jeeps,Tanks,Planes you name it and you can blow big holes in the side of buildings..You won't find any of this kind of thing in MW3 or Black Ops..Many are still playing this game online...The only problem with this game is that it has no split screen that's why I gave it 4 stars and not 5...You can't play with others in your house only other people that are online..
customer_reviews.author: Howrider

customer_reviews.title: A Birthday gift he was pleasantly surprised by
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to purchase video games for my husband without running them by him first, but on a whim I bought this game and he enjoyed it, evident by the fact he stayed awake all night playing it. Oh, inside every grown man is a boy looking for his next chance to get dirty, eat too much, and play past the point of exhaustion. Let your husbands be boys again, it's easy: video games, soda, candy, and you will be their Hero.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefCook&BottleWasher

customer_reviews.title: Great multiplayer game
customer_reviews.text: The multiplayer is really addictive. My first real foray into multiplayer. The single player feels like an on rails sort of game which kinda stinks. I officially went full-on nerd and got a gaming headset for this game. It's so much fun. The updated maps are terrific. Probably my favorite game thus far. Can't recommend this game enough. It's challenging but with some patients and weapon upgrades you'll unlock the full potential for maximum fun. I love this game.
customer_reviews.author: just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Battlefield 3
customer_reviews.text: I am still playing this game, its GRAPHICS are Great. Realism is wonderful.Its also chanlleging and not your run of the mill shoot-em-up games. One must be really precise and careful or one dies really quick and its start over again. This game for any real gamer is a must. Buy One.... This is one of those games one can play from now on and it will take sometime getting through it...which for me is Great. Highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game! I have played this game religiously for ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game! I have played this game religiously for years with a few friends and highly recommend it to anyone who likes first person shooters! The Battlefield series is in my opinion much better than Call of Duty. The game play is much more realistic with bullet drops and weapons that are not over powered. The maps and game modes are very similar to COD, but the game play is much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Han L.

customer_reviews.title: why you ask well its because BF3 just feels and plays better till this day
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't made the leap to next gen yet and still own a PS3 then this is definitely worth getting, yeah BF4 is also on ps3 but hey its still plagued with bugs and glitches, I own both BF3 on PS3 and BF4 on PS4 and I find myself constantly coming back to BF3, why you ask well its because BF3 just feels and plays better till this day, Im sure BF4 will too but not right now.
customer_reviews.author: mp3burn591

customer_reviews.title: 8===================D~~
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too into video games, but this one is the bees knees. I'm 21, so i grew up playing and loving games like ghost recon/Tom Clancy games and SOCOM. also, I'm a pretty big military/firearms geek. i love how real this game feels, and i love all the different combat options. if you want to stray away a little bit from the "run 'n gun" style of shooter, this one may be your ticket. this requires a little prepping and planning as well as solid team work and knowing your squad's needs. this game is a must have for any folks my age who want to fall in love again with video games <3
customer_reviews.author: bumpypanther

customer_reviews.title: Great game, my console just breaks when I play it!!
customer_reviews.text: The seller I ordered this particular item from sent the incorrect title, so I returned and purchased elsewhere. The game is great!! Excellent character control, great setup for balanced team play on all maps. sweet array of play modes, and the campaign was interesting enough for me to sit through cinematic sequences without complete boredom or frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great game, I love this game even more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game, I love this game even more than I do Battlefield 4, the story line was descent but the multiplayer was what had me glued on to the T.V. Large conquest maps will have you using a headset to communicate with your teammates to try and achieve success. Highly recommended. Great Work EA.
customer_reviews.author: IrishHypeDerailleur™

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, VERY BAD GLITCH
customer_reviews.text: I got this game last night, its been great so far. Except my game freezes on the loading screen in the beginning of the game. This seems to happen every time I quit the game them try to reload the game. I have to restart the game 5 or 6 times before it loads properly. The way around this seems to be to completely shut down your PS3 ( little switch on the back of the console) Once you switch it back it on, the game loads correctly. Any one else having this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Not better, just different
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not the same game as COD. There is a much better chance at tactical gameplay with a strategy involving real teamwork and a need for effective communication. COD has always been a run-n-gun type of game and that's fine for the deathmatch type games, but when you get into search and destroy there seems to be a lack of real tactical options like simple healing. Add to this the fact that that is no manned vehicular support and this game is a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Best Shooter Game
customer_reviews.text: Been playing for 8 months and still loving it. Playing multiplayer on PS3, also got Premium later on and it was absolutely worth it. You can get more strategic and more meaningful gameplay than Call of Duty. It does take some time to learn and get the feel for it but keep playing and you'll be addicted to this awesome game. I was excited for BF4 when I saw its preview, but I'm still not tired of playing BF3 and will be playing this as long as I can! Never experienced lag on cable internet, except when my internet service provider decided to upgrade the firmware of my new modem remotely. Might go back to using my older robust modem.
customer_reviews.author: Fonix

customer_reviews.title: Best game I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: If you are debating on whether or not to buy it just buy it. I can't talk much about the single player but the multiplayer is the best gaming experience I have had. The game is geared towards playing as a team. You don't have to have the highest kills to be MVP. Anyone whining about problems with the game probably whine about everything in life. I've played for almost 300 hours (BY FAR the most amount of time I've spent on a game) and I'm still not tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: i love this game
customer_reviews.text: people shouldnt compare this game to MW. its in its own league, MW is great in its own ways as this is great in many of its own. if you want closer to reality when it comes to warfare, this is probably the game for you. love this game. fan boys need to stop coming in the bf3 ratings and just rating it because its not mw, and vice versa. really both are good games, i personally prefer this over mw, but none the less, both incredible fps
customer_reviews.author: melmojares

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever made
customer_reviews.text: I've never wasted as much time of my life on anything as I have wasted on this game. All the while I've made some friends online, had some of the most action-packed battles ever, and it still hasn't spread out into my real life! Over 200 hours in this game and I am no more or less violent in real life - let's end the shenanigans that video games can make people violent, please!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun.
customer_reviews.text: Doubt anyone plays this now but, man... when this came out it was absolutely insane playing on metro, hahaha. Good times
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game. It is very close to the call of duty games. The story was very entertaining and a fun play through. It took me about 7- 8 hrs to play through the story. If you like COD games, you will enjoy this game for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Whattae Game!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far better than the COD Ghosts I played. I played in Medium level in both and I found Battle field to be a little complex and more fun to be with. I finished COD in 2 days. (4 hrs gameplay each). But it definitely tool me more than a week to complete this. That is real fun. However, I felt that the ending could've been more dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Still play to this day.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those games that you just don't get tired of playing. I bought this over a year ago and I'm still playing it consistently to this day. If you haven't played any of the Battlefield games yet and are still stuck quickscoping on Call of Duty, it's time to grow up and play with the big boys on this team oriented game. You owe it to yourself to try Battlefield 3. Play it with your buddies, you can thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Amos

customer_reviews.title: His Favorite One
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for an early Christmas present. I don't know that he has put in another game since he's been playing this one. He loves the graphics..he loves the challenge..he loves this game. Maybe too much? My only complaint is they say the word "OBJECTIVE" far too much. He doesn't notice..I do. "OBJECTIVE" seems to always be coming from the tv. :)
customer_reviews.author: docow34

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this game to fans of fps or military games
customer_reviews.text: Overall a enjoyable game with some issues on multiplayer. Does make the ps3 freeze as other stated but did not happen to often. Single player campaign was enjoyable and graphics were top-notch. Would recommend this game to fans of fps or military games.
customer_reviews.author: PhoBoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Son will love it for Christmas. Fast shipping, new sealed game as advertised. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: PSyac

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing from the very first minute you play it. The scenario is so real and the mission are well thought to transport you into real combat. The user interfase and controls are easy to use and you can select the level of difficult to be a real expert soldier
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great multiplayer!
customer_reviews.text: Why? Battlefield is a great multiplayer experience, large maps, team work, playing different roles and enjoying a war a bit more realistic. BF vs CoD: I play both and i love both. basically BF as mentioned above and it is less stressful and can be slower (in a good way). CoD is kinda a fast game with much more stress due to the quick spawn and kill and smaller maps. PS: I didn't play the story mode (single-player mode), I'm enjoying multiplayer.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim MA

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Okay game... Decided to give it a shot after lots of hours spent on black ops and black ops 2 and in the end i found that cod is a way better game overall. That being said bf3 does have some good points that are better than cod games, the main being the more realistic gameplay when compared to cod.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Bad seller
customer_reviews.text: The game is great just let me get that out of the way, but DO NOT buy it from this seller. The game came with a broken disk an unsealed case and no multiplayer code. But I could not get it to work anyways because the disk was broken, go buy it from some place else.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie C. Ganley

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: Came with beta for mass effect 3 :3 -Great game, great gameplay, Awesome physics, epic maps, infinite weapon and vehicle customization options, cant stop playing. -Single player campaign was a bit too fast in my opinion and looked a little too much like COD. -Graphics were a little disappointing but i guess i was expecting too much from the trailers. -In my opinion this game is tied with Skyrim and Uncharted 3 for GOTY
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Luc

customer_reviews.title: Game failed to meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because this was one of the first FPS ps3 game that I played for less than 10 hours before deciding it was not worth my time. The gameplay seemed choppy, it required an EA Account Key to play and the gameplay was not worth my time. I bought this because I liked the old Battlefield games (1942, Desert Combat) on the PC, but this failed to meet expectations.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Huge cod fan so this hits home for me. Only thing I wish was different is I wish it was a two player online game like cod. Had a few friends over and ended up not playing it because they couldn't play also as we do with cod. Really cool game though!
customer_reviews.author: Clohse

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this copy i had bad experience at gamestop ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this copy i had bad experience at gamestop with this game and when i returned it to gamestop and got another copy i came home and loaded it and it was the same copy so i bought this one and played it all the way through i am very happy would buy more games from you.
customer_reviews.author: valentina m kemp

customer_reviews.title: OMFG
customer_reviews.text: YES YES YES, this is such a clear cut game, you play to get into a real battlefield. You don't just play in a maze (call of duty) the map size never frustrates you because of the optional vehicle usage that is available to you. People still play this game since launch of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great game - VERY buggy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great online play, very realistic Cons: Buggy as hell, freezes PS3 often, must sign in to PSN BEFORE starting the game or it will freeze the system Overall I enjoy it, the only thing that would decrease the amount of fun in the game is the constant freezing of the game system. If you are buying it for single player mode, don't bother, has about 4 hours worth of single player gameplay
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GAME
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best game I've ever played, even now that I've upgraded to the PS4. I'm waiting for the equivalent of this (BF4 was absolutely NOT it).
customer_reviews.author: DGF

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. some great graphics. But nothing like the Battlefield 2
customer_reviews.text: Not better than the first but ok. I beat the game in lest than 8 hours!! It's not long at all. It's very simple. I wish they made it better. Battlefield 2 was the best of it all. They dropped the ball on this one. And I wanted too because I know how good battlefield is. But it's not as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Lynn

customer_reviews.title: still play it til this day
customer_reviews.text: for game that came out almost 8 years ago and i still played it
customer_reviews.author: Stevienix

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: First off the online is great, and I even like the campaign a lot. Although I mainly play for the online. I'm reviewing it although I havnt gotten it bc I have played it at a friends house and that's why I bought it. I already bought my online pass and I bought it here used for $28. Man was it a great deal. Btw I was an avid COD fan and this game has converted me, however I still want Black Ops 2 bc it seems closer to BF than the other games. This game is great with friends. Have a friend drive, u shoot or whatever. Mic up, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love playing BF3! Worth every penny and even saved a little $$$ buying it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Charis

customer_reviews.title: Some things great--some not so.
customer_reviews.text: The chat function was horrible in the beginning but they got that fixed. My biggest complaint would be that they keep wanting you to buy the expansion packs and premium add-ons. By the time you get everything they've added to date you into the game double the original investment. That and the fact they keep messing with the effectiveness of different weapons you keep having to figure out what weapon you prefer because the one you loved last time may be the one you hate this time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, but the multiplayer is definitely not for me because there are a lot of players who are just way too good at this. Also I like smaller maps so there is more action and these maps are huge. Single player is great though and is full of action. Fun game. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Highly addictive
customer_reviews.text: Kept my fiancé entertained for hours. He loves the story line as well as the battle sequence.
customer_reviews.author: Brandilyn Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just a hands down good game.
customer_reviews.text: Although Battlefield is at lest 2 years old, this is the absolute best time to buy it. It is only 20 bucks, a deal like that is impossible to let up. THe only downside to getting this game late is that it will take a good 2 hours to update all the info it has stored in the past years, but that only bugged me because I was so excited to play it. GET THIS GAME, if you were even just barely thinking of getting this game DO IT. Great graphics, sound, multiplayer, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Had tons of fun when I owned the game. Definitely worth the $40 I paid for it in entertainment value. Started to suck when people started glitching into the walls though.
customer_reviews.author: Ja.Ne.

customer_reviews.title: Same game for cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used so I didn't get the downloadable game content but that is of no issue to me. Seller had it packaged well and came really early. No scratches on my disc and it plays well without any issue. I use it for the Multiplayer so a great choice for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: PK N

customer_reviews.title: ... play this game until this day and it's still fun especially when you're playing with your friends
customer_reviews.text: I still play this game until this day and it's still fun especially when you're playing with your friends. The graphics great and they are way better than Any of the call of duty games.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN P.

customer_reviews.title: it sucks! Thank God there not a lot of hand ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is ok, but when it comes to hand to hand combat, it sucks! Thank God there not a lot of hand to hand combat, otherwise I give it -5 stars. Your character would have a hard time to beat up a 5 year old! There is no good direction how to fight in this game.
customer_reviews.author: Todd F

customer_reviews.title: A Glitch Filled Mess
customer_reviews.text: While this does have some good gameplay, it's tough to get passed the near complete lack of quality control. Whether it's the flying Jesus Marine in the final battle, the tank that's indestructible unless shot at just the right angle or the scene that must be completed blinded by screwed up lighting effects, this game was rushed. It should be noted that this is even after the latest update. They've also moved away from the fun loving, reluctant misfit heroe characters and plot of the previous games to a near copy of the Call of Duty: Modern Warefare storyline. Overall disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is absof***kinglutely by far the shooter game I like the most. It has an interesting story and the multiplayer... Oh men! The variety of weapons is just great and the environment are awesome, and with the back to karkand add-on... this game is complete. The only thing a could get to complain (wich is not even a real thing to complain about) is how the very first part of the opening looks, it makes my eyes bleed, but I can just turn my sight away during those couple of seconds, since it's only when I load the blue-ray.
customer_reviews.author: ERC@RP

customer_reviews.title: Game freezes
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this game today. I can barely get passed the first mission without it freezing and having to restart it. In the future, please make sure your games work before sending them off
customer_reviews.author: David Geary

customer_reviews.title: Great Multiplayer, otherwise..
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have played mostly all the First Person Shooters out there. This year, Battlefield 3 really excels in the multiplayer field. If you are more into Single Player Campaign, well.. it is disappointing somewhat. Not that much action, weak story-telling. However, I did not buy this game for its Single Player Campaign, I was looking to dwelve into the frenetic Multiplayer action. And I was not surprised when it totally exceeded my expectations. Jets, Helicopters, Tanks, Jeeps, bullets flying everywhere, die - respawn - get revenge satisfaction, etc etc. Really awesome MP!!
customer_reviews.author: Sephiel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This product meets all expectations that I needed. I like the state as arrival at their destination. Brand new. I highly recommend this product for its excellent quality. The quality and functionality of the item is much better than similar.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicio

customer_reviews.title: Guns
customer_reviews.text: Vehicles, Jets, it's everything Call of Duty wished it was. If you can get a team together do it! You will love yourself for it. Go PC though since PS3 will only run this at 720p. With a good enough PC you can run this at 2560x1600 and it will look incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew T. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: 100% nice
customer_reviews.text: this game is a excellent product, what I asked was expected, a quality 100 % , quality at low cost, the colors expected, I recommend this product to buyers, are you going to like, thanks ...
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the best first person shooters out there,I've played most of them and this one never gets old,online gaming takes a while to get used to especially target acquisition and flying the helicopters,but playing against my friends and strapping c-4 to their tank is just a riot,of course watching them crash the helicopters over and over again is fun too,get the premium edition for free map pack upgrades
customer_reviews.author: B.kerr

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I bought BF 3 because I disliked Call of Duty, Modern Warfare 3, but this game isn't what I expected. Slow matches and hard to control vehicles just won't make it. The graphics are superb and realism is excellent, but again, not a big fan of the franchise.
customer_reviews.author: Arrigo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this game. Single player is fun and provides some interesting challenges. Multiplayer is amazing! I am hooked! Just downloaded the Back To Karkand DLC last night and played a map on rush mode this morning.. Fun! BUY THIS GAME! Seller service for mine was good.. Shipped on time and arrived as such.. I pre-ordered the limited edition, but is all awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Farva

customer_reviews.title: The best $ 60 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I will be short... i was a cod fan until this game, is awesome in every way, the vehicles, the weapons, the specialties, the maps, the destruction, the history, the co-op misions, everything.. look if i meant it that is the only game i have won the platinium trophy... i recomend this game with my eyes close
customer_reviews.author: hipnosix

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I love BF3 because you get soo much bang for your buck! DICE, the developers, refuse to let you get bored of the game. They just keep it coming with all of their expansion packs which keeps the multiplayer game fresh and refreshing to play over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Bad a$$
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Lots of fun! I like it more than call of duty games!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: This was by far, one of my best buys for the ps3. It's been a while and I still comeback to this game with some of my former and new coworkers. If you get a premium then the game really goes beyond your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Game of All Time
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are a bit dated compared to BF1 but the gameplay is far superior
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: it is a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: the game is played every day now. It is a lot of fun. It could be only better if they maker had it figured it out for two or more players... I mean at home like Uncharted3 not on Live. Don't like to buy from amazon, will be buying elsewhere. They manufacture reviews and remove real peoples reviews. Shop elsewhere citizens:)
customer_reviews.author: steady shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best FPS out there.
customer_reviews.text: In an age where games like Call of Duty seem to attract such a wide variety of players, Battlefield 3 (B3) separates itself from the rest. If you are hoping for an easy kill, go back to Black Ops. If you are looking for a real battle...you don't need to look any farther than this. I'm 100% in LOVE with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Boss
customer_reviews.text: product arrived on time. the game is AWESOME. the single player is not that good. In fact i would say that the single player is worthless, but the multiplayer is outstanding. A must have for anyone who loves fast paced and high action shooter that is NOT MW3.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Better than COD make the "switch" TODAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I find the game-play to be much more refreshing than Modern Warfare. But in the end they are not really comparable. I will say this though, if you are into fast game-play and don't expect to see any in BF, they have fixed this with adding in a TDM. I have had this game since release date, and I am happy to say that it is one of the best video game purchases I have made in some time.
customer_reviews.author: EasyReps

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend! perfect game
customer_reviews.text: Disk is prefect 5 star for that but the case was a little cracked on the inside not noticeable and shipp was supposed to be 5days but took 3weeks so I give a 4 for that other wise 5 star for disk
customer_reviews.author: Gurki uppal

customer_reviews.title: Multiplayer is unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: If you play this with your friends using headsets this game is absolutely incredible. I personally did not like any FPS games, mainly because I kept getting killed every 60 seconds and because of the lack of strategy. This game combines teamwork, strategy, action and the best graphics. 5 stars! Can't wait for Armored Kill
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: average
customer_reviews.text: More realistic than the second and a big step up but for me I didnt like it as much. The story was poor. Perhaps rushed. Only played it through once which is unusual for me. Not nearly as good as mw3 where as I thought the seeing was better than mw2
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played first person shooters in a very long time (SOCOM doesn't count), and this game is fun. The best thing is that if you suck like I do, you can still level up and gain experience just for spending the time and trying. Multiplayer has blown me away.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tyme

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game, and it can keep you entertained for hours. The storyline is great, and the multiplayer is great as well in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: User_22

customer_reviews.title: great shooter
customer_reviews.text: I've played a dozen or so shooters in the past year and the battlefield games are by far my favorite. This is a top notch FPS although EA screws people buying used by forcing you to buy an online pass
customer_reviews.author: Kylee K. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't even get logged in
customer_reviews.text: I am not rating the game! I purchased this game, downloaded it and tried everything to get logged in and I could not. I played a bit offline and it wasn't bad but I was extremely upset that I couldn't get online to play.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great game.  Great graphics.
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Great graphics. I got it on Amazon for $30...worth every penny. It is not quite as good as COD but it is a VERY close second. If you love FPS, this is worth owning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frame

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a "very good condition" version
customer_reviews.text: The case was well taken care of, and the cd looks brand new! Ordered a "very good condition" version. Couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Xrt_11

customer_reviews.title: Impressive game, a must have for FPS fans!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I've had a great experience with this game, and as of today must bugs have been fixed, still suffering from some lagging issues on the PS3 but it doesn't deters me to have fun. The game pace is different from most FPS, except on the those game modes where map size is reduced. For me it's OK because I'm not so quick at other FPS and even helped me to get better. To summarize it isn't your typical run and gun FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: A mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: When it's on it delivers some of the best 1st person shooter gaming there is but it can be glitchy and sometimes laggy and there are problems with squad communication on the PS3. A mixed bag, it definitely has great multiplayer play when it's on though.
customer_reviews.author: Chauncy Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is really fun, and i never get bored playing it. Its just so fun playing with your friends. There is no better feeling than blowing up a tank with the help of you squad or bringing down that helicopter! This game is way better if you are in a squad and communicating. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: the best game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game because is so complete and real, the destruccion of buildings, the opcion to drive tanks ,jets hellicopters is so fun , the only thing i didnt really like is that some scopes for the weapons when u aim the sides of the scope almost covers all the tv screen and looks bad but most of the scopes are ok..other than that i would say is a perfect game....
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!33
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time. Also came with the booklet and online Code. I bought this from Ocean Reef on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

product_meta.title: Battlefield 3 - Playstation 3
product_meta.description: Platform:PlayStation 3| Edition:StandardBattlefield 3 leaps ahead of the competition with the power of Frostbite 2, the next installment of DICE's cutting-edge game engine. This state-of-the-art technology is the foundation on which Battlefield 3 is built, delivering superior visual quality, a grand sense of scale, massive destruction, dynamic audio and incredibly lifelike character animations. As bullets whiz by, walls crumble, and explosions throw you to the ground, the battlefield feels more alive and interactive than ever before. In Battlefield 3, players step into the role of the elite U.S. Marines where they will experience heart-pounding single player missions and competitive multi-player actions ranging across diverse locations from around the globe including Europe, Middle-East and North America.
feature_bullets: Battlefield 3 introduces Frostbite 2, the incredible technology that takes animation, destruction, lighting, scale and audio
Feel the impact of bullets and explosions, drag your fallen comrades into safety, and mount your weapon on almost any part of the terrain
The best online vehicular warfare experience gets even better with a fitting sonic boom as fighter jets headline impressive lineup vehicles
Take the fight to iconic and unexpected urban locations in the USA, Middle East, and Europe
Experience gripping multiplayer action with 2-24 player battles supported online

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,437 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
